Reviews.Title: This is the real thing
Reviews.Author: samurai
Reviews.Content: This swann RG-59 Siamese cable is the real thing. You have to be careful as many companies will tell you their cable is RG-59 when it is a thinner version called micro RG -59. Should you have to replace the BNC connector this is easily accomplished with the Swann cable. Having installed cable for years I highly recommend this product. One additional note this cable is rated for ceiling and walls.

ProductInfo.Features:
Superior Quality Integrated With Dc Power & Coaxial Rg-59 Cable
Bnc Connectors For Cctv Video Cameras
Easy To Install Siamese Joints Tear Away As Needed
Improved Quality Video Signal
Fire Rated Ft4/Cmr & Ul Approved For In-Wall Installation
ProductInfo.Name: Swann Fire-Rated Bnc Extension Cable (200 Feet) SWPRO-60MFRC-GL
